website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're hunting pests, small game, or target shooting, this precise air rifle will not let you down.
pros: Gets up to 16 shots per fill
Optimized for hunting up to medium-sized prey
cons: This premium air rifle is sold at a fairly high price

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The Gen one has a better shot string out of the box. Although the Gen II is advertised as being quieter I don't think so. The rifle does not ping like the gen one but it is also less air efficient. Regardless of all these factors, if you put a nice scope on it you too can shoot the flies off your target at 25 yards and kill ground squirrels out to 75 yards with essentially no practice. On a 2800 PSI fill you will get 16 or so shots before the POA starts dropping. This is about the best backyard friendly bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship for a $500 air rifle
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this synthetic stock PCP air rifle is a disappointment. While it is very quiet and reasonably accurate out of the box, the fit-n-finish is poor for a ~$450-$500 air rifle. This rifle is actually made in the USA. I have air rifles which I purchased for under $200, made in other countries, that are flawless. This Benjamin is anything but. The synthetic stock is poorly made. And the metal parts have marring that can’t be buffed out. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Stereoman

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet tack driver!  Absolutely awesome 😁
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first Marauder, but it is my first Marauder rifle with the synthetic stock....I wasn't sure I would like it, but I LOVE IT! The difference in weight between it and my wood stock Marauder .25 may not actually be very much, but it FEELS like a lot, and (for me personally) is easier to shoulder and hold on target longer. Though neither are loud, the .22 seems considerably more quiet than my .25
customer_reviews.author: lawrence g dixon

customer_reviews.title: took the plunge
customer_reviews.text: This riffle is awesome ..once air tank was purchased to fill, an assortment of pellets , a shooting rest , a decent scope , and targets to shoot ..I was like a little kid giggling from being tickled...well worth the money spent ..I was hesitant about spending so much for a air riffle , alot of research and u tube videos over and over but I took the plunge and glad I did ..got it for myself for My 50th B day.. waiting for warmer weather to shoot all day ..instead of an hr or so in the cold..
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Makes shooting fun again.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this Benjamin Marauder. I put a Hawke scope on it, bought a used SCBA tank on EBay, filled it up to 3000 PSI. I sighted it in at 25 yards, made a few adjustments and with 8 rounds they were all touching. This is off a Caldwell Shooters Bag, not real steady but I saw what the rifle is capable of. I am very impressed, so impressed I am going to buy the Marauder in .177 cal to get more shots from a fill. The last 8 shots I took were low then I looked at the pressure in the rifle and it was down to 1000 PSI.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Note location and clearance for magazine when rifle is loaded when selecting your scope rings
customer_reviews.text: Rifle came shipped in its original box; large hole present; presumably from shipper. Was really nervous opening it but relieved to see no internal damage. Rifle is well built but unlike any other air gun I’ve ever owned before. Be aware the gun has standard 3/8” dovetail scope mounts when ordering your scope rings. I used the Weaver T-22 Base Pair and then attached my scope with standard Weaver mounts for added clearance since the magazine sticks up a bit from the receiver when it’s loaded. See photos Will update after I get everything set up.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: right out of the box wont fire not even one ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the worest product i have bought online. people should aware, DO NOT BUY THIS GUN, PAIN IN THE ASS. few month back it could not fire.when out.of.box and return for repair. after a month they sent back with notice could not find defect. and now it is the same when i sent back for repaire, on the top of that, there is no way to put the pellet in because there ony 1/8 inch gap, which means they did not.even check for any thing at all. now alrady 6 months after a purchased and never fire a single shot. DO NOT BUY THIS GUY
customer_reviews.author: benny Ma

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and well made air rifle. This definitely more than a toy with plenty of pop. It is a full size rifle. I was able to mount a x3-24 56mm scope to it. Using the hand pump to fill it is a bit of a workout. When I get a chance I’m going to purchase the scuba tank to fill the air.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice air gun
customer_reviews.text: Great gun and the price was better than pyramyd air. Accurate, doesn't leak. No issues. Pumping with hill mk4. Don't love the pump, but don't have another to compare to. Don't have a tank yet either as I can't find a place near buy to refill larger tanks to 4500psi. Pumping not easy, but if you don't intend to shoot target a lot, it will do the job. Negative parts: -it's heavy. - floating barrel will shift the point of impact if you lean it on the barrel or grab it by barrel. A lubed oring between the barrel shroud and that mount fixed that problem. - the stock is a little flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Alex Secerator

customer_reviews.title: awesome gun
customer_reviews.text: This gun is awesome super quiet plenty powerful. I'm getting 1 hole 9 shot groups at 25yds and hitting 3inch spinner targets almost every shot at 100 yards. Has taken a few squirrels and it drops them on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: mrtdrew

customer_reviews.title: Its just okay, if you dont mind fliers every few shots
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about buying this, go with the .25 cal instead. If you must have a .22 and don't mind a loud report, you would be much better off with the Sumatra 2500. If you like tweaking and adjusting your rifle forever, this is the one for you If you want a rifle that shoots straight and accurate out of the box, you should look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: ... hesittant at first and then just went for it glad i did the dang thang is just spot on ...
customer_reviews.text: got the 25 cal of this was hesittant at first and then just went for it glad i did the dang thang is just spot on and the energy is wow had it sighted in with less then a mag and was hitting bottle caps at 50 plus yard by the third mag and the real plus is how quit it is wow again
customer_reviews.author: sharky

customer_reviews.title: Magazine defective, but easy fix
customer_reviews.text: I want to give it a 4.7. When it first came which was today, the magazine was defective. it didnt turn all the way around. it left extra 2 shots in the magazine, which means the spring tention was not enough. so i disassembled the magazine and it was just only a 3 minute fix. now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: mark lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pcp I have this gun sighted in deadly accurate at 50 yards with the jsb exact diablos 1/2 group at 50 yards. The gun is virtually silent. Sounds about like shooting a paintball gun. I have the .25 caliber so I can’t say for the other calibers. But the .25 is deadly accurate with the right ammo!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Seller 100% Recommended, very good service, Quality, Speed ​​and good prices on their products,
customer_reviews.text: Seller 100% Recommended, very good service, Quality, Speed ​​and good prices on their products,
customer_reviews.author: R75DIVSWFC

customer_reviews.title: Do Your Part
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate holds zero and is powerful enough to take out skunks rabbit coyotes etc... I shoot the king heavy NOT the MKII the original. First gun however was missing seals, problem Dealt with in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Casler.Inc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gun for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this gun for two months now and it has been one of my best purchases when it comes to air rifles. I am consistently able to shoot half inch groups at 50 yards with the jsb exact monster diablo 22 18gr pellet. It is an awesome gun for pest control, the sound of the pellet hitting the target is louder than the air rifle discharging.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Benjamin Marauder PCP rifle
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Benjamin Marauder PCP rifle. I had heard good things about the .25 caliber and I was not disappointed. I have only been out to the range once but it was deadly accurate at 25 yards. I will be shooting out to 50 yards when the weather warms up in the Northeast. It is simple to operate and seems well made. For the money, this is a great buy for a quality, entry level, accurate PCP rifle. I highly recommend it. Just remember to get high scope rings to clear the magazine, and they must have a base that will fit 11mm dovetail.
customer_reviews.author: THIS IS SPARTA !!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hunting rifle
customer_reviews.text: Very amazing gun!! Couldn't have asked for a better product have had it for over a year now and came banging straight outta the box I was dropping birds and rabbits at 30yrds with little to now effort pumping the gun is difficult and takes many pumps but once at full power it has the potential to shoot up to 3-5 full magazine at a decent power my air gauge went our early but I requested a new one and crossman sent me one free of charge over all amazed with the product
customer_reviews.author: geovanny bautista

customer_reviews.title: Get the nomad electric pump fo it, fill at home in a few minutes and easy as pie. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Out of box, scope on, tweaked a little, 40 yards inside an inch w/4 clips. 857 FPS exact king .25 diablos 25.39 grain. Very quite. Best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J NC

customer_reviews.title: Best PCP I own and the synrod is a beautiful beast!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 5 PCP's and there or four springers, but for the price. I don't think you can beat these rifles for the price. Every one gravitates to this rifle and want to take it home with them. I bought my daughter the small benjamin disco .22 for her smaller frame, but she wants my .22 Synrod! Guess what I have to buy her. I own the .25 and will be buying the .177
customer_reviews.author: Mr 407

customer_reviews.title: It feels comfortable in grip
customer_reviews.text: This air rifle is insanely accurate. It feels comfortable in grip, light, and that trigger.. The trigger is better than most of my firearms triggers! Only negative i can see is that the bold is a little tough to work. Would definitly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Freakin awesome! Shoots incredibly tight groups
customer_reviews.text: Freakin awesome! Shoots incredibly tight groups. A bit heavy, which I like. Seems well built and it is easy to work on and modify.
customer_reviews.author: Meds

customer_reviews.title: I’m a big fan of this line I probably have ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of this line I probably have everyone that they made for the price you can’t beat it with a stick
customer_reviews.author: Zboyz 808

customer_reviews.title: Buy A Different Gun
customer_reviews.text: When the clip works, it shoots straight and true. However, its Achilles's Heel is the clip. They are total garbage. 75% failure rate.
customer_reviews.author: JGB

customer_reviews.title: pigeons beware
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. Right out of box it was shooting a dime sized group at 25 yards. After shooting break barrels for a few years, I noticed my wound to drop dead ratio dramatically improved with this rifle. I thought teds holdover was crazy for always taking head shots at birds. Now I know why. The pellet goes where you aim, not like a break barrel. Very impressed with the flat trajectory and range. Thanks Benjamin.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Other than the lever being hard and the magazine sliding with difficulty It’s perfect I was lucky and mine can shoot at 20yds within a quarter inch Haven’t found the moderator for it - which may help make it quieter No issues with seller or delivery
customer_reviews.author: alejandro chapa-rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and powerful. I love this rifle very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Fitted with UTG 4-16X44 scope, performs as reliably and accurately as the reviews claim. On dB meter, registers as much noise indoors as a light hand clap.
customer_reviews.author: TGray

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rifle.  Leaks out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in and has a slow leak. Pump to 2500 and it bleeds off to 1500 overnight. It fires okay and I like the rifle. I will be contacting their customer service department for a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This rifle is awesome. Extremely accurate and quiet! Need to get an air tank now. I didn't mind pumping up my Benjamin Maximus, but this is a little more work! Definitely not a deal breaker though. It would be nice if it was a little lighter in weight. Get one, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Norton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the air rifle! Very accurate and quiet! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FoShuo

customer_reviews.title: I love the 8 shot magazine which makes it very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: The benjamin marauder .25 cal does not play around! It is very powerful and accurate. I love the 8 shot magazine which makes it very easy to load. I have taken small game even at low psi and it still knocks them down like a ton of bricks however you may want to adjust for the pellet drop as the psi level drop too.
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Nope dont do it get the maximus!
customer_reviews.text: Oit of the box its awful..a lot of tuning needs done and alot of parts you need to buy..I have the benjamin maximus and murader ..if you want a solid no hassle gun buy the maximus..was very disappointed with the maruader..here we go more money and hope it shoots as good as the maximus!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great gun. Pellet choice matiers
customer_reviews.text: Great gun. Pellet choice matiers. Defects in manufacturing can throw the odd pellet wild. I find the bolt action a little stiff until you know where it is. First few times I did not pull it all the way back. Once you know where it is. It's no problem. It's heavy ish. Which I like. Be careful. The barrel completely floats. Don't lean it against things by the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Soren R.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate pellet rifle
customer_reviews.text: Good very accurate, and has a punch. A bit heavier than I would like, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: cootertwo

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is great.
customer_reviews.text: Pellet stuck in the barrel on the very first shoot. The gun came like used. Rusty markers on bolt. Box had been opened, no manual, no safety or warranty card in box. Update: got the replacement, great gun, good accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Haibin Guo

customer_reviews.title: The best gun!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time looking for a gun, this is the best gun money can buy. They say you get 32 shot per fill I’m getting 55, you can get 60 but it’s a little over an inch wide.!!! Pair it with a UTG true hunter AO 3-9x50mm and a cvlife bipod. Works best with Crossman premier domed and the hollow point version!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally an air rifle i can use and enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love, I'm in love and i don't care who knows it. Great Gun.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Hand pumping the Marauder may be difficult for some. But it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good accuracy and powerful for small game hunting or pest control. Bolt came in kind of stiff, but lubricating should make it smooth. It sounds funny with the springs when firing, but can be fixed. Right out the box, I had a 2 inch group with barracudas at 30 yards. After sighting in the scopes, I had pretty good consistent shots.
customer_reviews.author: Toubee

customer_reviews.title: Accurate AF, super quiet, quality made PCP!
customer_reviews.text: Quality made, accurate AF, super quite! Pesting/plinking 10-40yards. Out of the box shooting JSB Jumbo Heavy 18.13g @ 730-740 FPS, 21-22 Ft-Lbs. Set up with a T-WOD 6-24x-50mm scope, Caldwell XLA 6-9" Bipod - Pivot Model. This Marauder is a PCP beast! I love my Marauder. There are none like it!
customer_reviews.author: C-Low

customer_reviews.title: one of the best in Benjamin Marauder family
customer_reviews.text: one of the best in Benjamin Marauder family. better than wooden - - not heavy, more easy to take care for, adjustable cheek better than pistol - obvious reasons +screwing port cap better than .30 cal - more shots + much better suppressor than all previous models

customer_reviews.title: super quiet
customer_reviews.text: One can drive nails with the gun. Quarter size groupings every time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KdUB

customer_reviews.title: A very accurate air rifle. My old air rifle ...
customer_reviews.text: A very accurate air rifle. My old air rifle would shoot a group the size of a volley ball at 30 feet (I wish I was kidding). This rifle shoots a 1/4 inch group at 30 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. He used it to go ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He used it to go squirrel hunting. He killed 5 squirrels first time out. It was so quiet, that he shot three before they were being shot at.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN SKERLICK

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: Quality Air rifle. Weakness in the mag which is plastic spring fed and NOT Intuitive to load, but many instructive Vids on-line so Not a big Deal. Accurate, quiet, good ergonomics...except for Mags...top rate.
customer_reviews.author: Gear Head

customer_reviews.title: Great gun. Also purchased Crosman pump and works well
customer_reviews.text: Great gun. Also purchased Crosman pump and works well. Can take about 30 shots from 3k to 2k psi and takes about 50 pump strokes to get pressure back to 3k.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This rifle is extremely accurate with the H&N pellets. Mine is the .177 and I use the the domed match pellets. I highly recommend this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Bl

customer_reviews.title: She's Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Best Purchase Ever. Everything you hear about this rifle is true. Loved it so much I had to get the .177 & .25 caliber.

customer_reviews.title: All around amazing except for the magazines
customer_reviews.text: 25 cal Great powerful good quality gun. Magazine insertion can be tedious at times but otherwise I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great gun! Accurate! .22cal.
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this gun! I can take out rabbits at 60 yds , no problem. I can hit a black bird at 35 yds. almost every shot...amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It shoots so on point that once you ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It shoots so on point that once you find the pellets it likes you can put a whole clip through the same whole. My only down side is I bought a pump with it and it is tough to get the air full if your less then 200lbs u won't be able to fill it all the way. But I still love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Stonie mcpuff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it, you won't be disappointed. Short spending twice as much there isn't much better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Only thing is that it is heavy with my gamo scope mounted on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for bushy tail
customer_reviews.text: Love it, this one doesn't leak air, the second one around is the keeper.very happy
customer_reviews.author: jerry lee gentry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent accuracy. Lots of power.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of reviews of this rifle online so I won't provide in-depth details. I was charging the rifle from a scuba tank to about 2800 psi with each 8-round magazine. Using Benjamin domed hunting pellets at 15 yards from a benchrest, and a 3-9x Leupold EFR scope, it cut a ragged hole just a little larger than the pellets after 8 shots. Noise level was about the same as a pneumatic staple gun. Maybe less. Point of impact remained unchanged after more than 70 shots. It was also able to punch a hole through 1/2" plywood at that distance. Definitely not a toy. A very precise, quiet and powerful air rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Sensui

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gun
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason this air rifle is so popular. It is almost too quiet. Easy to tune however you want it to shoot... max power, perfect bell curve or low power with a ton of shots. Very accurate... Crosman/Benjamin ftw!
customer_reviews.author: Trainwreck'd

customer_reviews.title: Al were a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few guns before this one including the baa grt lighting. Al were a waste of time. Now I'm not sure about hand pumping this up o 3000 psi I went with the scuba fill set up. But this is a amazing air rifle look no further for the money. I can put 5 shot plus though the same hole at 40 yards and I'm no pro. All in all amazing gun
customer_reviews.author: Sein B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great gun,
customer_reviews.text: Great gun out of the box, have not adjusted anything from factory, it shoots 1/2 groups at 50yards with 18.1 grain Jsbs. My only problem is the manual is not large enough and doesn’t explain enough in detail.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be well made, Powerful, and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have tested at 50 and 75 yards very powerful, and accurate.

customer_reviews.title: You cant get a better gun unless you wanna spend a $2000
customer_reviews.text: Best gun for hunting and target shooting, the only better gun is a $2000 FX impact.

customer_reviews.title: Love this gun
customer_reviews.text: Love this gun.took me only a handful of shots to sight in and is a nail driver with a full tank at 40 yds.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn B.

customer_reviews.title: You don't see alot of good reviews on this gun for the money you can't ...
customer_reviews.text: You don't see alot of good reviews on this gun for the money you can't Beat this gun I have a 22 caliber gun it shoots Great not a Bit pellet fussy sight it in with the Benjamin PCP Howell Point pellets sight it right in at 25 yards I all so shoot predator polymag jBS 15.89 grain Falcon pellets and field trophy N & H pellets they all hit the same spot if you guys out there just shoot the gun the way you get it you will get around 30 Dead on shots I have two nitro piston 2 air guns this Marauder is the best airgun I have I would highly recommend this gun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: diablo kings really shoot well. it's a very large and heavy gun but extremely accurate and very quiet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gun for pest/varmint control. Only drawback is pumping it up to 3000psi.

customer_reviews.title: amazing capability!!!
customer_reviews.text: This air rifle is very well made very accurate i can shoot very tight groups with it using chp and i have taken dow coons, crows, sparrows, squirrels, rabbits, and just last week i killed 2 nutria rats that were damaging the diches. Overall great air rifle can shoot feom long range and is better than all my other break barrels.
customer_reviews.author: Doroteo Gonzalez Vivar

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful air rifle! This thing is a beast ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful air rifle! This thing is a beast and very accurate! This is a must have for anyone into air rifles. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: oscar f. cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Hits like a hammer!
customer_reviews.text: I nicknamed mine Mjolnir because it absolutely hammers the crap out of anything. I figured it was a fitting nickname since it was Thor's hammer. I have been happy with my rifle and have been very impressed by its accuracy. JSB Match Diablo Exact King .25 as well as Predator Polymag is what I have found to be the most accurate in my Marauder.

customer_reviews.title: How  to take care
customer_reviews.text: I don't like one thing magazine It's the 4ht magazine broke in jus just couple rounds
customer_reviews.author: Artemio hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this rifle
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this rifle. After a good cleaning and some pellet testing shooting half inch 10 shot groups at 35 yards. jSB 18 grain seem to group the best for this rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Great PCP rifle really quiet and very accurate great customer service as well
customer_reviews.author: Alyissa Eklund

customer_reviews.title: Love this air rifle
customer_reviews.text: Love this air rifle. Perfect for a big person like myself. Has a lot of power for a good price. Only regret is the synthetic material feels pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Martin T. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pellet gun, very accurate and anything you shoot drops in its tracks. Buy this gun you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Patten

customer_reviews.title: Benjamin Marauder .25 cal
customer_reviews.text: Received the air rifle it was well packaged and arrived 2 days early, pumped it up with the Benjamin air pump had no problem even at 60 years old getting to 3000 psi, I sighted it in with my leapers scope at 25 yards right now until I get to setup a longer target. I was able to put 2 mags of 8 rounds into a quarter size target each and every time I shot it. Wonderful and very accurate, the magazine was confusing at first but a quick YouTube video fixed that problem. I am very happy with it very glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A nice rifle. It is performing as expected. just doing my first steps with an air rifle. Can't say much more by now.
customer_reviews.author: alanwe

customer_reviews.title: best entry level PCP air rifle on market hands
customer_reviews.text: Accurate and deadly with JSB jumBo exact pellets......best entry level PCP air rifle on market hands down
customer_reviews.author: Martin Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is Great - 90 shots - from 3000 psi to 1000 psi.
customer_reviews.author: RightHalfPlane

customer_reviews.title: Animals of all types... ok small ones... be ware
customer_reviews.text: Well under 1 MOA out of the box accuracy with this thing. 5 pellets in the same hole. Suggest benjamin domes or JSB diabolo match exact kings for target, and Predator P-mags for hunting. The domes aren't as effective at taking animals.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gun.Well Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gun. I ordered the .25 caliber and found it to be lighter then other smaller rifles like the .177 and the .22 cal. the gun is extremely quite as well. no blowback. this is easily the best airgun I've ever purchased.good quality gun.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Cureno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air rifle
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate out of the box extremely accurate after tuning! Awesome air rifle!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Booher

customer_reviews.title: A joy to shoot! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Benjamin Marauder 22 Pistol for several years and have loved it. But I always wanted to "step up" to the 25 Caliber Rifle. So glad I did. It's accurate, amazingly powerful and lighter than I expected. A real joy to shoot. Don't wait. Get this Air Rifle!
customer_reviews.author: CJP Tech

customer_reviews.title: I really liked how the rifle was carefully packed
customer_reviews.text: I received the pellet rifle in an ordinary brown box. I removed the brown box that the Benjamin air rifle was enclosed in. The actual Benjamin box did not show any tears or as if something heavy was placed on top of it. Opening the Benjamin box, I really liked how the rifle was carefully packed. The air rifle was in pristine condition. I'm still sighting in the air rifle but so far the discharge is quiet and I am not worried about bothering my apartment neighbors. This is a really well worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silent but deadly
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing tool- it's super quiet, for what it's doing. I love the rotary magazine, though the bolt-action requires a good 20% more effort at the end of the pull-back than I would hope for. Powerful? At close range, it blows the back out of a 2X6 pine board... I'd say that'll do it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Sylva

customer_reviews.title: I understand that the way it works with marauders is you either get a great one outof the box or an unlucky one
customer_reviews.text: The bolt seal o-ring popped out while cocking 3 times, the o-ring became lodged in the magazine, and thus jammed the entire bolt mechanism. I understand that the way it works with marauders is you either get a great one outof the box or an unlucky one. I unfortunately got a bad one and had to return it. I may someday order another
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P.

customer_reviews.title: What hasn't already been said.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is the barrel can get scuffed up and scratched resulting in paint coming off and showing the silver metallic color. It doesnt effect performance in any way but still kind of annoying that brushing against trees and brush takes the paint off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accuracy and excellent hunting air rifle
customer_reviews.text: This is the most air rifle I have ever used. Awesome accuracy and excellent hunting air rifle. It is deadly on squirrels and with well placed shots it kills raccoon. I am an avid hunter that uses hunting dogs to tree wild game. When I am talking about dispatching animals it is not some backyard shot but in the top of trees. If you are like me and tired of trying to find 22 long rifle shells look no further get yourself the Marauder.
customer_reviews.author: darren petty

customer_reviews.title: Received rifle from seller in great condition and on time
customer_reviews.text: Even though the mag failed after four loads the rifle itself performed flawlessly. Crosman replaced the mag with no questions asked. The rifle deserves fives stars. Received rifle from seller in great condition and on time. Totally satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: del

customer_reviews.title: Good first time PCP .
customer_reviews.text: This makes a good first pcp rifle , accurate at 50 yards in .25 cal , and back yard friendly
customer_reviews.author: Moss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my first pcp and i love it! great out of box performance and power.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Tack Driver!
customer_reviews.text: This gun is fantastic. It shoots dime size groups at 25 yards! Awesome accuracy and very quiet!
customer_reviews.author: WPNorton

customer_reviews.title: I regulated my gun to 1850psi and put a spring stop guide in and it's perfect. There's nothing else I need to do to ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was buying before I got it. Unfortunately I did not win the barrel lottery, but that was remedied with a hammer forged barrel. Now with a regulator installed it's a tack driver at 50 yards and holds a sub moa at 100 yards. Plus I'm getting 30 shots with less than 10 fps extreme spread at 840fps. I regulated my gun to 1850psi and put a spring stop guide in and it's perfect. There's nothing else I need to do to this gun. I am disappointed in the Crosman quality control on their barrels, but the Marauder platform has so much potential.
customer_reviews.author: J. Norgaard

customer_reviews.title: 25 yard accuracy about the same as a 22LR cartridge in a good 22 cal rifle
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but well built, 25 yard accuracy about the same as a 22LR cartridge in a good 22 cal rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Drudger

customer_reviews.title: Fine gun, light
customer_reviews.text: Fine gun, light ,seems to be accurate ,easy to pump with hand pump , but I pump it back up at 2400 psi. Took about 1 half hour first time but I was trying not to over heat pump. Review may change only fired 30 rounds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased !
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about spending this much money on an air rifle after seeing some of the bad reviews. But I ordered a synrod anyway. I am very pleased to say that I have had zero problems. The gun shoots as straight as I can hold it and the air pressure does not leak down ! It is very nose heavy but it shoots great...
customer_reviews.author: Craig S. Chase

customer_reviews.title: This is what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Packing was very good and shipped quickly. Very pleased with this gun. Beginning to work on a custom tune and having fun shooting this gun.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but troublesome.
customer_reviews.text: It's the most accurate rifle I have ever shot but it is also the most troublesome gun I have ever owned. The bolt is hard to pull back. The barrel o-ring came out easily when the rifle jammed. The rifle takes a long time to pump up with the hand pump. An electric air compressor pump for this gun is very expensive. A spring type air rifle like a Ruger is lots more fun to shoot and no troubles. Get this gun only if you like lots of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Baehr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power and accuracy. 25 cal is the way to go. Actually faster than some of my .22 cal powder burners.
customer_reviews.author: Daron

customer_reviews.title: Pure awesomeness in an air gun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rifle! Extremely powerful and accurate! My go to gun for varmints and squirrels. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: mrt202

customer_reviews.title: You can't ask for more Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my many weapons and it is awesome for the price, you can't beat the price for the quality of this rifle, it is in the same grouping as above-$1k competition
customer_reviews.author: WSPJR

customer_reviews.title: Just hit purchase, it's that good.
customer_reviews.text: Do it..., just do it, hit purchase..., if you've got a break barrel and you're researching how accurate it is compared.., stop, just stop, buy this thing and watch all your sorrows disappear. If you already know you need a PCP this is the one you need to start with. Quarter patterns at 70 yards easy..., There is no kick at all.., at all, did i say at all..., I get 30 shots from 3k to 2k psi. Did i say 30 shots..., plenty, with no drop in pellet on target. Yard rats beware..,
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

product_meta.title: Benjamin Marauder Synthetic Stock PCP-Powered Multi-Shot Bolt-Action Pellet Hunting Air Rifle
product_meta.description: The loudest sound you'll with a Benjamin Marauder is the pellet hitting the target. With virtually no recoil, very little noise and tack-driving accuracy, the newest Marauder goes lightweight with an all-weather synthetic stock, featuring an ambidextrous raised comb. Well-balanced for carrying in the field, this powerful PCP-powered air rifle is the quietest and most accurate in its air rifle class delivering speeds up to 1000 fps. The two-stage, adjustable, match-grade trigger system helps to make every shot smooth, while the innovative 10-round magazine allows for fast follow-up shots. With the built-in pressure gauge and quick-disconnect Foster fitting, refilling is quick and easy. Built for hunting, great for target shooting too.
